args.name: url
args.question: What video do you want to play? Use the full URL.

sink.doc: start playing a video by URL
sink.confirmation: play $url on your LG WebOS TV

args.name: power
args.question: Do you want to turn the tv on or off?

set_power.doc: turn off the TV (turning on is not supported)
examples: set the power on my lg tv to $power

args.name: video_id
args.question: What video do you want to play? Use the ID from the last part of the URL.

play_youtube.doc: open the YouTube app on the tv and start playing a video
play_youtube.confirmation: play $video_id from YouTube on your LG WebOS TV
examples: play the youtube video $video_id on my lg tv

play_netflix.doc: open the Netflix app on the tv and start playing a video
play_netflix.confirmation: play $video_id from Netflix on your LG WebOS TV

args.name: video_id
args.question: What video do you want to play? Use the ID from the last part of the URL.

play_amazon.doc: open the Amazon app on the tv and start playing a video
play_amazon.confirmation: play $video_id from Amazon on your LG WebOS TV

raise_volume.doc: increase the volume of the tv
raise_volume.confirmation: increase the volume on your LG WebOS TV

lower_volume.doc: lower the audio volume on the tv
lower_volume.confirmation: decrease the volume on your LG WebOS TV

args.name: percent
args.question: What volume do you want to set (in percent)?

set_volume.doc: set the volume on this device to the given percent value
set_volume.confirmation: set the volume on your LG WebOS TV to $percent %
examples: set the volume of my lg tv to $percent

mute.doc: change the mute status on the tv

unmute.doc: change the mute status on the tv
examples: give voice to my lg tv
